Text:
Now then... According to the map, the Secret Hot
Spring For One should be around here―

According to the map, the hidden location should be
around here―
Wha—?! Pooch?!
...Why?
That's my line. What're you doing on Volcano Island?!

I just...was dragged here by my sister. I really
didn’t want to come, but then she mentioned
there's a great hot spring…

Goodness, Pooch! You are so easily lured by things you
like.

... Anyway, why are you here, Princess? I am sure you
didn’t come just for the hot spring.

Same reason as your sister. Iris is leading the
Crimson Order on a monster hunting mission
here on the island. She brought me along.

There are a few days until the operation begins, so I
was taking a walk around here.
Huh. Interesting.
Seriously, didn’t your sister tell you anything?

No, there's no way she didn’t explain things. I think
you just weren’t listening.

...It’s not known why, but for a long time, huge
monsters have been appearing on Volcano
Island. What's more, none of the monsters
are native to the local ecosystem.

The Emirate of Muspel, which governs Volcano Island,
keeps their numbers in check by offering competitive
bounties and recruiting lots of expeditions,
regardless of size or affiliation.
Hmmm.

The Crimson Order is sponsored by my sister, but it
is a new order. They need to enhance their strength
by gaining experience.

Your sister is worried about your future. Isn’t that
why she made you join this mission, Pooch?
Who knows? I certainly don’t.
Anyway, never a bad thing, getting a bounties.

Fulfilling requests from guilds offering bounties...
It's pretty stereotypical stuff, but I’ve never tried
it before.
Pooch...?
Oh, errm, nothing. Good luck, Princess Alexia.

Save your breath. There are a lot of question marks
hanging over the source of the bounty, and the
appearance of these monsters―
Why are you thinking so hard all of a sudden?
Well... No, never mind.

I am going ahead, so see you. The hot spring is
limited to one person at a time.
Ah...! Damn, she went ahead of me.

(The funding for the bounty... This is Volcano Island,
so there must be veins of valuable minerals hidden
here.)

(And monsters of a different ecosystem are appearing.
There has to be a pattern. Like, are they coming from
a different world?!)
In other words...this isn’t just a moneymaking scheme.

Yes, something writhes through the void of heaven
and moves beneath the earth.

Amazing, Cid. You somehow knew something was amiss
on this island before the Shadow Garden’s spy network.

The Garden created a register for this mission in
order to investigate. How should we proceed?

...I'll take action myself. That's why I came all the
way out here.

I understand. If you need anything at all, just say
the word.

(As I thought, Alpha and the others are following the
smell of gold! Still, it’s a fun earning opportunity,
and they'll let me go at my own pace!)

Actually, thinking about it, Alexia's been in the hot
spring a long time. Usually, she goes in after me
and comes out before me…

Anyway, I should take this moment to finish
registering and other things...
